name: 中英筆譯（一）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【TIC9001  基礎口筆譯入門】 ◎課程開放上修
description:
A班:本課程以實際譯案作為授課內容，介紹翻譯的基本原理，並增進學生的實務經驗，並學習如何管理及執行譯案。

B班:
The course is designed to be an introduction to the study and practice of literary translation. It seeks to develop students’ basic translation skills and to increase their awareness of different theoretical approaches to literary translation and Translation Studies. Two aspects of the study of literary translation will be covered in the course: theory and practice. First, a lot of translation exercises and discussions will be involved. At the same time, we shall also read some important theoretical texts concerning the study of literary translation. It is hoped that by the end of the semester, the students will be able to produce a proper literary translation and identify the challenges they have confronted in the process of translation.
goals: 增加翻譯實務經驗，提升翻譯技巧及熟悉管理及執行譯案的技巧。
運用所學理論，判斷適合的翻譯策略並了解如何搜尋譯案相關領域知識
